content: sunshine granny square is the pattern pdf version from my youtube you can learn how to crocheting from my channels free video tutorials https //youtu be/ay22m92r79q 1 happy crocheting skill level medium ~ requires experience dimensions of the granny square the granny square you can create by following this pattern will be about 12 cm 4 72 inch the pattern is detailed with easy to follow written directions it is written in standard american terms in english all used abbreviations are listed and explained in the pattern conversion table to uk terms is provided also the pattern also provides needed yarn amou 1 https //youtu be/ay22m92r79q
